meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Nancy Brough Neil Jensen Dan Green Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #373.

td.p: Nancy Brough, a speech pathologist from Santa Monica, California
Neil Jensen, a sales manager originally from Chicago, Illinois
Dan Green, a teacher from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,700)

tr.td: EUROPE
GOLF
THE LAW
MEDICAL FOLKLORE
NEWSPAPERS
FIRSTS

toggle('clue_DJ_6_5', 'clue_DJ_6_5_stuck', 'Unfortunately, this aptly titled 1975 sing was 1st & only hit for Roger Whittaker:

There\'s a ship lies rigged and ready in the harbor
Tomorrow for old England she sails
Far away from your land of endless sunshine')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
Unfortunately, this aptly titled 1975 sing was 1st & only hit for Roger Whittaker:
There's a ship lies rigged and ready in the harbor
Tomorrow for old England she sails
Far away from your land of endless sunshine
